events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all.
The customer's issue is categorized under Refund due to the request for money back related to a sizing problem.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Maria Lopez for further handling and response.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket due to sizing issues.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the jacket is in its original condition, never worn or washed.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response and help with the return process.
We have received the jacket back and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this refund request case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us if you need further assistance.
